Header: Mahamaya Girl Guides Supported for Their Jungle Expedition
Content: Troops of the 111 Brigade, 11 Division and the Signal Training School located in the general area of the Security Force Headquarters-Central (SFHQ-C) offered their assistance to the girl guides of the Kandy Mahamaya Girlsâ€™ School for conduct of their annual SEGNO excursion and the competition that got underway on Saturday (3) inside the Dunumadalawa Forest reservoir. Necessary guidelines, instructions and other technical assistance was provided by the troops in aforesaid establishments on the directions of the Commander, Security Forces - Central, Major General Ruwan De Silva and under the supervision of the General Officer Commanding, 11 Division and the Commander, 111 Brigade.
